I've just discovered KLAXXON, but it looks like he's doing a great job, even if some of the the torrents were previously available.  He's bringing together some high quality product.  Because he's got a following, these movies are all thoroughly and dependably seeded, and his blog is fun to read.  I intend to start leaving comments.

thx.  i was looking for avp1.  hard to find a good, fast tor of this now.  much obliged.

Thx Klaxxon this was on tv last night and I could have recorded it to my harddrive, but then I'd have to convert it to MP4 or something, that would take hours and hours on my system..

This way, I get what I could legally have taped of the tv onto my computer, without wasting time and global resources on converting it myself.

Thank you very much. By the way, I look at the movies that are on each night, most nights there are two or three good ones these days, and I download them and see them in the morning. That way I can do more interesting things at night, where I am more into exercising and so, so tv doesn't get in the way.

And again, it saves time and energy resources, so great service, keep up the good work. I think I'll have to get Lord of the Rings next, it's on tv every Christmas.

God bless you, people need to realize how legal this is.

Thanks,

Jesper from Denmark
